aster Sufferer Olbedan was a priest of Ilmater the Broken God, dwelling at the House of the Harmed in Aralent in the Vilhon Reach. Olbedan was widely regarded as a saintly and trustworthy soul.
In the Year of the Boot, 1343 DR, the people of Hlondeth in the Vilhon Reach requested that the Graycloaks Wolves adventuring company deliver the Tome of Torment—the holiest book of the church of Ilmater—to Master Sufferer Olbedan in Aralent. However, during the harsh winter, Graycloaks Wolves fell prey to doppelgangers and leucrotta preying on travellers and never made it to Olbedan. The Tome was thought lost in the winter snows.
